api-integration.title: API Integration Details
api-integration.description: The Crypto Price Tracker fetches real-time data from the CoinGecko API, a popular and reliable service for cryptocurrency information.

challenges-solutions.title: Challenges & Solutions
challenges-solutions.description: Every project encounters hurdles. Here are some challenges we faced while building the Crypto Price Tracker and how we solved them.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Crypto Price Tracker documentation! This project is a simple web application built using Next.js that displays live cryptocurrency prices, and it includes developer documentation powered by Docusaurus.

setup.title: Project Setup Guide
setup.description: This guide walks you through installing and running both the Next.js web application and the Docusaurus documentation on your local machine.

state-management.title: State Management Explanation
state-management.description: This project manages data flow and state primarily through React Query, a library focused on simplifying server-state management. Hereâ€™s why we chose it and how it works in practice.
